titles: [Here begynneth the booke which the knyght of the toure made and speketh of many fayre ensamples and thensygnementys and techyng of his doughters]
author: La Tour Landry, Geoffroy de, 14th cent.
Caxton, William, ca. 1422-1491.
date: the yere of oure lord M CCCC lxxxiij and enprynted at Westmynstre the last day of Ianyuer the fyrst yere of the regne of kynge Rychard the thyrd. [1484]]
notes: A translation by William Caxton of the French original by Geoffroy La Tour Landry.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Women --  Education, Medieval --  Early works to 1800.
Conduct of life --  Early works to 1800.
